label: Sensor
comment: An object which can detect and measure physical properties and which can record, indicate and transmit such measurements.

datatypeProperties.comment: The code specifying a position of this monitoring sensor.
The percentage of the remaining battery charge of this monitoring IOT device.
A code specifying a type of MDH health indication.

objectProperties.comment: An actual calibrated measurement reported for this monitoring sensor.
A control setting parameter defined for this monitoring sensor.
An operational parameter defined for this monitoring sensor.
A product certificate granted for this monitoring IOT device.
A manufacturer party for this production process.
A party who owns this piece of logistics transport equipment.
A calibrated measurement of precision for this monitoring sensor.
A scheduled calibrated measurement reported for this monitoring sensor.
A measure of a value for this document characteristic.

referencedBy.comment: An embedded sensor of this monitoring IOT device.
A remote sensor of this monitoring IOT device.
